description: A reply to a forum topic or another reply, with threaded parent references and community attribution.

main.description: Record containing a reply to a forum topic or another reply.

contentFormat.description: Content format. Defaults to 'markdown' if omitted.

root.description: The original topic (AT URI of forum.barazo.topic.post).

parent.description: Direct parent (topic or reply). For top-level replies, parent == root.

community.description: DID of the community where this reply was created. Immutable origin identifier.

facets.description: Annotations of text (mentions, URLs, hashtags, etc).

langs.description: BCP 47 language tags indicating the primary language(s) of the content.

createdAt.description: Client-declared timestamp when this reply was originally created.
